subject: refactor: use semantic tone colors and remove categories
body:
Each tone now has a semantically meaningful color:
- happy: golden yellow (#FFD93D) - joy
- sad: soft blue (#6B9BD1) - sadness
- angry: red (#E85A5A) - anger
- calm: soft teal (#7DC9C0) - peaceful
- excited: bright orange (#FFB060) - energetic
...and so on for all 37 tones

Removed tone categories (Feeling/Attitude/Energy) from UI:
- Simplified Tone interface (removed category property)
- ToneSelector shows flat list: "Most Used" + "All Tones"
- No more category indicator dots or section headers
- Cleaner, less cluttered interface
title: use semantic tone colors and remove categories
